text: Freimut Duve (26 November 1936 – 3 March 2020) was a German politician and writer. He was born in Würzburg. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). He served as a member of the national Bundestag from 1980 to 1990. He was also the OSCE Representative on Freedom of the Media from 1998 to 2004. Duve died in Hamburg on 3 March 2020. He was 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Freimut Duve at OSCE.org Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Würzburg Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Writers from Bavaria Category:Writers from Hamburg
title: Freimut Duve
